content: **introducing the soft chemo cap pattern with 3 brim options ** craft a comforting and stylish chemo cap that offers both beauty and versatility this pattern features three unique brim options to suit any preference 1 simple single_crochet brim a classic clean finish 2 shell or scalloped edge brim a touch of elegance with a decorative flair 3 half_double_crochet ribbed brim for a cozy textured look and feel designed specifically for those without hair providing a comfortable fit and gentle feel made with soft acrylic worsted weight yarn pattern includes a bit of my cancer journey & how to wash chemo caps so that they continue to be soft which is important for a chemo patient there is an easy to read tablet version and an easy print version that has small font the pattern is well-written and easy to follow with video tutorials available to guide you through each step the pattern has graduating shells at the crown making this an intermediate crochet pattern but i know you are up for the challenge copyright statement this pattern is protected by copyright© krissys over the mountain crochet 2024 do not sell alter or redistribute this pattern in any way or form you have my permission to sell your finished product but you are responsible for the finished product no mass production
